Literature.Title: Turning cationic antimicrobial peptide KR-12 into self-assembled nanobiotics with potent bacterial killing and LPS neutralizing activities
Literature.Author: Lei R, Yang C, Sun Y, Li D, Hao L, Li Y, Wu S, Li H, Lan C, Fang X

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Mouse erythrocytes:3% Hemolysis=50 µg/ml,Mouse erythrocytes:12% Hemolysis=100 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=16µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>128µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=8µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=>128µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=64µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 13883(MIC=8µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 13883(MIC=64µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 13883(MIC=>128µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 17978(MIC=8µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=32µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=32µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MIC=8µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=8µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii(MIC=8µg/ml)
